synopsis.text:
Senra, Shima, Sakata, and Urata, the four members of the male vocal group Urashimasakatasen, embark on a new journey as high school students in the anime "Days of Urashimasakatasen." As transfer students, they all aspire to make a lasting impression on their classmates and become the most popular students in school.

However, things don't go as planned for Urata and his little Tanuki when they encounter their eccentric classmates. Sakata, the scatterbrained student, arrives late with breakfast still in his mouth, while Shima makes a grand entrance by falling from the ceiling with an elaborate stage setup. Senra, on the other hand, secures a quiet seat before anyone else even arrives.

With such fierce competition, can Urata and his Tanuki keep up? Will they become friends or foes with their fellow transfer students? This heart-racing youth story follows the adventures of these four high school students as they navigate the ups and downs of school life. Get ready for a wild ride filled with laughter, drama, and unforgettable memories!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
